text: A Virgin Among the Living Dead is a 1973 European erotic horror movie It was directed by Jesús Franco. Franco made the movie in 1971. It was released in 1973 after some footage was added without Franco's involvement. It was later re-cut with some extra zombie footage. It was shown in theaters again in 1981 as a zombie movie. It has been restored on DVD to Franco's version. ==Other websites== * ==References== Category:1973 horror movies Category:1970s erotic movies Category:Belgian horror movies Category:French horror movies Category:Italian horror movies Category:Liechtenstein movies Category:Portuguese movies Category:Spanish horror movies Category:Movies directed by Jesús Franco Category:Movies set in Portugal
title: A Virgin Among the Living Dead
